```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
```
 Import Kanzel ISN and Radio Flux data
```{r import data}
rm(list=ls())
kanzel <- data.table::fread("./kh_spots.csv")
kanzel$Ymd <- as.Date(kanzel$Ymd)
kanzel$Year <- year(kanzel$Ymd)
kanzel$Month <- month(kanzel$Ymd)
kanzel$Spots <- kanzel$n_s + kanzel$s_s
K1 <- kanzel %>% select(Ymd,Year,Month,R,Spots)
radio <- data.table::fread("./radio_flux.txt")
radio$Ymd <- as.Date(paste(radio$year, radio$month, radio$day, sep = "-"))
R1 <- radio %>% select(Ymd,year,month,f10.7)
```
 Solar Cycle which go from start date to date of maxium beginning with cycle 21
```{r Cycle 19}
K19 <- K1 %>% filter(Ymd >="1954-04-01" & Ymd<="1958-03-31")
R19 <- R1 %>% filter(Ymd >="1954-04-01" & Ymd<="1958-03-31")
```
```{r Cycle 20}
K20 <- K1 %>% filter(Ymd >="1964-10-01" & Ymd<="1968-11-30")
R20 <- R1 %>% filter(Ymd >="1964-10-01" & Ymd<="1968-11-30")
```
```{r Cycle 21}
K21 <- K1 %>% filter(Ymd >="1976-03-01" & Ymd<="1979-12-31")
R21 <- R1 %>% filter(Ymd >="1976-03-01" & Ymd<="1979-12-31")
```
```{r Cycle 22}
K22 <- K1 %>% filter(Ymd >="1986-09-01" & Ymd<="1989-11-30")
R22 <- R1 %>%filter(Ymd >="1986-09-01" & Ymd<="1989-11-30")
```
```{r Cucle 23}
K23 <- K1 %>% filter(Ymd >="1996-08-01" & Ymd<="2011-11-30")
R23 <- R1 %>% filter(Ymd >="1996-08-01" & Ymd<="2011-11-30")
```
```{r Cycle 24}
K24 <- K1 %>% filter(Ymd >="2008-12-01" & Ymd <="2014-04-30")
R24 <- R1 %>% filter(Ymd >="2008-12-01" & Ymd <="2014-04-30")
```
Begin Plotting of Cycles
```{r Plot Cycle 19}
K19 %>% ggplot(aes(x=Ymd,y=R)) + geom_line() + geom_smooth() +
  ggtitle("Cycle 19: Kranzel  ISN")
R19 %>% ggplot(aes(x=Ymd,y=f10.7)) + geom_line() + geom_smooth() +
  ggtitle(" Cycle 19 Radio Flux: f10.7CM")

```
```{r Plot Cycle 20}
K20 %>% ggplot(aes(x=Ymd,y=R)) + geom_line() + geom_smooth() +

R20 %>% ggplot(aes(x=Ymd,y=f10.7)) + geom_line() + geom_smooth() +
  ggtitle(" Cycle 20 Radio Flux(f10.7CM)")

```
